titleInfo.title: Letter from William Merewether, Jacobabad to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding news from Kandahar, including of Mahomed Ameer Khan [Mohammad Amir Khan]'s tyranny.The letter also discusses a request from Pelly for some rifles, describing the differing types that are available, along with descriptions of the damage some of them can cause; the new furlough regulations and their difficulties; and Henry and Malcolm Green's applications for leave to return to England for six months.
